text:
(a)     The provisions of this 
Chapter 49A are not applicable to purely commercial literature that is not directly related to the building tenancies. 
     (b)     The provisions of this 
Chapter 49A shall not be read to limit or replace residential tenant or landlord rights or remedies found in other ordinances, or in statutes or Constitutions. 
(Added by Ord. 9-04, File No. 031701, App. 1/16/2004)
